description: Number of new terms at stage n in the formation of A030717.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
prog: (Haskell)a030719 n = a030719_list !! (n-1)a030719_list = tail $ zipWith (-) (tail a253170_list) a253170_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 28 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
